item.title: 面对必和必拓的挑战，Codelco 继续保持顶级铜生产商的地位
item.description: 在报告 2024 年铜产量超过必和必拓集团（BHP Group）之后，Codelco 以微弱优势保住了其世界最大铜生产商的地位。【原文：Codelco has retained its status as the world’s biggest copper producer by the slimmest of margins after reporting 2024 output that nudged past that of BHP Group.】

item.title: 瑞典记者乔基姆-梅丁在土耳其被拘留
item.description: 据瑞典新闻社 Dagens ETC 网站上的一篇文章称，该社记者约阿基姆-梅丁（Joakim Medin）在土耳其被拘留。【原文：Joakim Medin, a journalist for Swedish news service Dagens ETC, has been detained in Turkey, according to an article on the outlet’s website.】

item.title: 缅甸称地震造成 144 人死亡，722 人受伤
item.description: 缅甸称，周五发生的地震已造成约 144 人死亡，700 多人受伤。【原文：Myanmar said about 144 people have been killed in the earthquake that struck the country on Friday, with more than 700 injured.】

item.title: 挪威国防部长称挪威在北极地区的利益与美国一致
item.description: 挪威国防部长周四表示，尽管华盛顿发出的信息不一，但挪威与美国在北极地区的军事合作依然密切。【原文：Norway’s military cooperation with the US in the Arctic remains close despite mixed messages from Washington, the Nordic country’s defense minister said Thursday.】

item.title: Powerbeats Pro 2 评论：最佳运动耳塞音质仍有差距
item.description:
Beats最新款运动耳机经过改进，但面临的竞争比以往任何时候都更加激烈。【原文：

Beats’ newest exercise headphones are improved, but they face stiffer competition than ever.

】

item.title: 美国消费者情绪因关税推动价格预期而下挫
item.description: 由于对关税的担忧持续升温，本月美国消费者情绪跌至两年多来的最低点，长期通胀预期跃升至 32 年来的最高点。【原文：US consumer sentiment tumbled this month to a more than two-year low and long-term inflation expectations jumped to a 32-year high as anxiety over tariffs continued to build.】

item.title: 选股人的天堂在等着你
item.description:
在本期《Merryn Talks Money》节目中，Kernow 的 Alyx Wood 解释了他的对冲基金为何将战略重点放在特定市场上。【原文：

On this episode of Merryn Talks Money, Kernow’s Alyx Wood explains why his hedge fund’s strategy is focused on a particular market.

】

item.title: 英国经济开始摆脱停滞状态
item.description: 去年，首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）上台执政时曾承诺促进经济增长，但结果却导致经济下滑。然而，九个月过去了，英国经济可能终于迎来了转机。【原文：Prime Minister Keir Starmer came to power last year promising a growth boost but ended up presiding over a slump. Nine months on, however, the British economy may finally be turning the corner.】

item.title: 巴西财政部长将卢拉支持率下降归咎于全球困境
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）在接受采访时说，巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦的支持率跌至历史最低点，主要原因是困扰世界各国领导人的经济挑战，而不是他本人的政策失误。【原文：Brazil President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s popularity plunged to all-time lows largely due to economic challenges that are plaguing leaders around the world rather than his own policy missteps, Finance Minister Fernando Haddad said in an interview.】

item.title: AppLovin 聘请律师事务所调查卖空指控
item.description: AppLovin Corp.已聘请一家律师事务所对做空机构关于这家移动广告公司在其平台上虚报广告业绩的指控进行调查。【原文：AppLovin Corp. has hired a law firm to investigate short sellers’ allegations that the mobile advertising company is fraudulently juicing ad performance numbers on its platform.】

item.title: 拉斯维加斯吸引西雅图百万富翁逃离财富税
item.description:
美国的赌博之都渴望吸引更多资金和技术精英，而亚马逊和微软的故乡正在推行美国首个财富税

。【原文：

The US gambling capital is eager to attract more money and tech savvy while the land of Amazon.com and Microsoft pursues the US's first wealth tax

】

item.title: 经济学家在特朗普的不确定性中下调美国经济增长预测
item.description: 经济学家们调低了对美国今年经济增长的预期，认为在特朗普政府不断变化的贸易政策所带来的不确定性日益加剧的情况下，美国的消费支出将更加疲软，资本投资也将更加有限。【原文：Economists dialed back their expectations for US growth this year, envisioning softer consumer spending and more limited capital investment amid mounting uncertainty created by the Trump administration’s ever-evolving trade policy.】

item.title: 埃利奥特在英国石油公司激进主义运动中做空壳牌股票
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理有限公司（Elliott Investment Management Ltd.）正在英国石油公司（BP Plc）开展激进活动，该公司已持有相当于伦敦同行壳牌公司（Shell Plc）0.5%股份的空头头寸。【原文：Elliott Investment Management Ltd., which is in the middle of an activist campaign at BP Plc, has taken a short position equivalent to 0.5% of shares in London-based peer Shell Plc.】

item.title: 中国可以等待特朗普关税对铜的影响
item.description:
当货物争先恐后地涌向美国海岸时，红色金属的最大消费国可以保持耐心。【原文：

The top consumer of the red metal can afford to exercise patience as cargoes race for US shores.

】

item.title: 力拓与刚果就开发获奖锂矿进行谈判
item.description: 力拓集团与刚果民主共和国就开发世界上最大的硬岩锂矿床之一进行了会谈，这是这家矿商热衷于这种电池金属的最新迹象。【原文：Rio Tinto Group has held talks with the Democratic Republic of Congo about developing one of the world’s biggest hard rock lithium deposits, in the latest sign of the miner’s enthusiasm for the battery metal.】

item.title: 比利时人称华为老板可能知道欧盟涉嫌行贿一事
item.description: 据比利时司法当局称，华为技术有限公司高管很可能知道—并在—2021年向欧盟立法者行贿的指控上签字。【原文：Huawei Technologies Co. executives would likely have known about — and signed off on — alleged bribes to European Union lawmakers in 2021, according to Belgian judicial authorities.】

item.title: 保加利亚部长表示将继续推进天然气网扩建工程
item.description: 保加利亚能源部长表示，这个巴尔干国家将在未来几周内开始建设一个天然气电网扩建项目，作为乌克兰终止俄罗斯过境后提高产能的地区努力的一部分。【原文：Bulgaria’s energy chief said the Balkan nation will begin construction on a gas grid-expansion project in the next few weeks as part of a regional effort to boost capacity after Ukraine ended Russian transit.】

item.title: 美国核心 PCE 通胀回升，支出弱于预期
item.description: 美联储偏好的通胀指标在 2 月份以顽强的步伐上升，家庭需求弱于预期，表明消费者在对财务状况日益担忧的情况下更加谨慎。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s preferred inflation metric rose at a stubborn pace in February and household demand was weaker than expected, illustrating a more guarded consumer amid growing concerns about finances.】

item.title: 加拿大 2 月经济在关税威胁下停滞不前
item.description: 由于关税威胁日益加剧，加拿大的经济增长在今年稳健开局后戛然而止。【原文：Canada’s economic growth came to a halt after a solid start to the year as tariff threats mounted.】

item.title: 诺沃格拉茨的银河公司将在纽约露娜赔偿案中支付 2 亿美元
item.description: 迈克尔-诺沃格拉茨（Michael Novogratz）的银河数字控股公司（Galaxy Digital Holdings）将支付 2 亿美元的罚款，作为与纽约总检察长达成的和解协议的一部分，原因是该投资公司在推广失败的 Luna 加密货币过程中扮演了重要角色。【原文：Michael Novogratz’s Galaxy Digital Holdings will pay $200 million in penalties over the investment firm’s role in promoting the failed Luna cryptocurrency, as part of a settlement with the New York Attorney General.】

item.title: 亚洲需求下降，欧洲液化天然气购买量创季节性纪录
item.description: 欧洲的液化天然气进口量飙升至一年中这一时期的最高水平，原因是竞争对手亚洲的需求疲软，从而在关键的囤积季节到来之前缓解了价格。【原文：Europe’s liquefied natural gas imports surged to the highest level for this time of year, bolstered by weaker demand in rival Asia, easing prices ahead of a crucial stockpiling season.】

item.title: 瑞银应考虑将搬迁作为 "B计划"，自主公司称
item.description: Autonomous Research 公司称，瑞银集团应将总部搬迁视为瑞士资本辩论中的 "B 计划"，而不是将其归入内部讨论的一个不起眼的角落。【原文：UBS Group AG should see relocating its headquarters as a “plan B” in the Swiss capital debate rather than relegating it to an obscure corner of internal discussions, Autonomous Research said.】

item.title: 印度公布 27 亿美元电子零部件生产计划
item.description: 印度联邦内阁周五批准了由国家支持的2,292亿卢比（27亿美元）的电子元件生产补贴，作为世界上人口最多的国家，印度正努力加强制造业并创造就业机会。【原文：India’s federal cabinet Friday approved 229.2 billion rupees ($2.7 billion) in state-backed subsidies for making electronics components as the world’s most populous nation seeks to bolster manufacturing and create jobs.】

item.title: 泰晤士水务首席财务官科克兰将于三月底离职
item.description: 泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water）表示，首席财务官阿拉斯泰尔-科克伦（Alastair Cochran）将于 3 月底卸任，正值这家负债累累的公用事业公司寻求扭转财务状况之际。【原文：Thames Water said Chief Financial Officer Alastair Cochran will step down at the end of March, just as the debt-laden utility seeks to turn its finances around.】

item.title: 越南商会称越南电力企业面临大规模破产风险
item.description: 越南工商会在致议会的一封信中说，如果国家公用事业部门继续按计划改变可再生能源的定价，越南可能会出现太阳能和风能生产商破产的浪潮。【原文：Vietnam could experience a wave of bankruptcies of solar and wind producers if the state utility proceeds with its planned change in pricing for renewable energy, the Vietnam Chamber of Commerce and Industry said in a letter to parliament.】

item.title: 学校膳食如何促进全球农业改革
item.description: 至关重要的学校供餐计划为全球约 4.18 亿儿童提供了食物，并创造了约 400 万个直接就业机会。同时，这些项目也需要大量的粮食和农作物来喂饱不断长大的胃。【原文：Crucial school-meal programs feed some 418 million children and have created about 4 million direct jobs around the world. They also require huge amounts of food and crops to feed growing stomachs.】

item.title: 甲骨文公司与 Leidos 公司的合同成为美国五角大楼成本削减者的目标
item.description: 美国国防部表示，作为五角大楼削减成本努力的一部分，它将终止使用甲骨文公司软件管理其文职人员队伍的计划。【原文：The US Department of Defense said it will terminate a plan to use Oracle Corp. software to manage its civilian workforce as part of the Pentagon’s cost-cutting efforts.】

item.title: 根据欧盟数字规则，苹果和 Meta 将被罚款
item.description: 苹果公司和 Meta Platforms 公司将在下周末被处以欧盟《大科技竞争规则》规定的罚款，其中 iPhone 制造商还将面临欧盟《数字市场法》规定的经常性处罚威胁。【原文：Apple Inc. and Meta Platforms Inc. are set be hit by fines under the European Union’s Big Tech competition rulebook toward the end of next week, with the iPhone maker facing the added threat of recurring penalties under the bloc’s Digital Markets Act.】

item.title: 日经新闻》称软银可能为美国的人工智能事业认捐 1 万亿美元
item.description: 据《日经新闻》报道，软银集团公司计划在全美创建人工智能产业园，并考虑投资超过1万亿美元。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. plans to create industrial parks for artificial intelligence across the US and is considering an investment of more than $1 trillion, Nikkei reported.】

item.title: Reddit 暴跌 50%，增长放缓未能吸引 "逢低买入 "者
item.description: Reddit 公司的股价从 2 月份的高点下跌了 50%，在动荡的科技股压力下，围绕该公司的阴郁情绪未能消散。【原文：The gloomy sentiment around Reddit Inc. has failed to dissipate after its shares fell 50% from a February high, with volatile technology stocks under pressure.】
